comment._content:
Hi Sadads-

That's wonderful! We always love to see Wikipedia fleshed out with our Commons images.

Best,
Catherine Shteynberg
Smithsonian Institution Archives

comment.author: 44959668@N02
comment._content: Did you know that local DC Wikipedians have talked with you before about collaboration? We have a page at en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:GLAM/SI and if you have anything in particular that you think should be written as an article, you should leave us comments at en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia_talk:GLAM/SI.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Hi Sadads,

Effie here. We are looking forward to doing more with you and I'm going to get in touch with Katie this week. 

Right now, much of what happens on sites like Flickr and Wikipedia are done above and beyond our typical job duties. As I don't want us to do things and then abondon because of lack of time, we sometimes take a little while to get going. Please don't take this as a sign of our lack of interest.

Looking forward to working with you more,
Effie

comment.author: 44959668@N02
comment._content: Sounds great, we may have some activities in the near future at the Zoo, including a photo scavenger hunt and some mapping for OpenStreetMap. Also, we are working on a bid for a 2012 Wikimania conference in DC, so we should be in contact with you guys in the near future about what is going on :)
